price: 101. Zij zullen voor eeuwig in die toestand verblijven en zeker, die lading voor hen op de Dag der Opstanding!
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
